description: Numbers that are congruent to {0, 1, 2, 3, 6} mod 8.
comments: For n >= 2, 5*(a(n)+k)*Pi; where k = 0, 4, 3, 1 if n mod 5 = 0 or 1, 2, 3, 4 respectively; is also the total length of irregular spiral (center points: 1, 4, 3, 2, 5) after (n-1) rotations. [_Kival Ngaokrajang_, Jan 08 2014]
links: Kival Ngaokrajang, Illustration of irregular spiral (center points: 1, 4, 3, 2, 5)
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,0,0,1,-1).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
